forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Sunny then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 5pm. Sunny, with a high near 67. Southwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the night unfurls with a gentle clarity, the air soft and cool, reminiscent of the whispers of a sea breeze. As the city bathes under a cerulean sky, the temperature rests comfortably at 56 degrees. The west-southwest wind dances lightly, creating an almost soothing atmosphere. As night turns to day, expect the sun to gradually illuminate the skyline, with temperatures reaching around 67 degrees by afternoon. Though the rays will likely shine bright, a hint of uncertainty lingers in the air, as there’s a slight chance of rain beginning after five, a gentle reminder of the ever-mysterious Pacific climate.

For those stepping out, layers will be your faithful companion—think light sweaters or jackets to fend off the cool wind, particularly during the morning’s embrace. As the day unfolds, may the allure of the waterfront beckon you to take a walk, perhaps along the Embarcadero, where the rhythmic lapping of waves against the pier offers a serene backdrop to your thoughts. Alternatively, a casual café visit in the warmth of the afternoon sun would also be a delightful way to enjoy this moderately pleasant day. Just as the bay's fog appears and dissipates, savor your hours here, navigating the delicate balance of sun and shadow that characterizes San Francisco.
